intro_text: Your support keeps Gamma Omicron strong. Whether you pay annual dues, contribute to scholarships, or support the housing corporation, every dollar makes a direct difference to the brotherhood you love.
hist_intro: The Pi Kappa Alpha Historical Society has identified three initiatives that will not only help preserve our history, but also make it ready and available for brothers to enjoy. The mission is to compile and create, as best as possible, a holistic history of each and every chapter, make it accessible to every member no matter where they are, and inspire passion for our history along the way!
hist_note: Gamma Omicron (Ohio) Chapter's individual project total:

hist_projects.name: Digitizing Your Chapter's Membership Record Cards

card_desc: Keep the alumni association running strong through annual dues and direct contributions that fund newsletters, events, chapter support, and capital improvements to our chapter house.

options.name: Annual Alumni Dues
options.desc: Funds newsletters, events, and chapter support
